description:
You may have heard of Django and Flask, which are the two great mountains of the Python web framework.
There is a new web framework that has been quickly gaining popularity with developers since its launch in 2018.
FastAPI. It was also introduced in PyCon.
I'm sure many of you have experienced this at one time or another.

The difference between Django, Flask and FastAPI in this session.
And as the name suggests, we're going to look at the architecture, focusing on how FastAPI was able to achieve “Fast.”

Informational
He currently works at Microsoft as a Solution Architect. Prior to this, I was responsible for embedded development and finance back-end development for about 10 years. I teach a variety of courses in the field of infrastructure. I am interested in developing stable and productive code quickly, and I am honored to have the opportunity to introduce FastAPI.
title: PyCon KR 2023 FastAPI Deep dive reading
